infoSectors.waterSanitation: Ndiyam & hakkilgo bee njamu e siwaaku

feedbackInstruction: Usseni ɓiɗɗugo kuuje koosugo daande ngam a` koosa jawaabu. To a` ɗo yiɗi, a` accan lammba ko ɓe tawtata ma haa nder lellal man.
unsyncedRecordings: Soynde howugo chamen gam hoosugo dannde
